guides.name: Jane
guides.certification: Rafting, Cullinary Arts, Hunting, Woodworking and First Aid
guides.bio: Jane is a Vietnamese woman the owner met during his travels to the East. She has been on the water in one way or another since she was a little girl. She is so confident on the water we joke that she has gills.

guides.name: Bob
guides.bio: Bob is the owners nephew. He needed a summer job and hounded the owner long enough that he caved and gave him the job.

guides.name: Frank
guides.bio: Frank got his start on a crab boat working in Alaska. He claimed that he was getting a bit too old for it and decided to get a job here with us.
